body.name: PrimaSleep 9 Inch Modern Metal Bed Frame/Mattress Foundation/Steel Slats/No Box Spring Needed/Sturdy/King Size/Black
features: [ Outer Dimension ] - 79.5 inch x 75.5 inch x 9 inch (Inner Dimension: 77.5 inch x 73.5 inch)
[ No squicking noise ] - Adapted with precise design and technology, ensures no squeaking noise, while maintaining safety and durability
[ Sturdy Frame ] - Reinforced high-quality materials that ensure both safety and durability, providing a strong and reliable support structure
[ No box spring needed ] - Versatile design offers wide compatibility, accomodating any mattress type, with or without a box spring
[ Extra Storage ] - Enjoy spacious bed room with 8 inch additional storage beneath the frame for seasonal clothe, blanket
body.description: Primasleep 9 Inch Modern Metal Bed Frame offers a simple but luxurious design. The anti-slip feature ensures a secure and stable connection between the bed frame and your mattress, eliminating slipping or wobbling. Created with heavy-duty steel and innovative design, the frame guarantees a quiet sleep experience while providing strong support and seamless assembly. Versatile in design, Primasleep's frame is compatible with all mattress types, with or without a box spring.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Storage space Spacious 6.8 inch storage space under the frame, provides space efficiency storing linen, out-of season clothes and other items. Anti-slip Anti-slip stickers on slats prevent mattress from sliding. Stylish rounded edges Rounded edges are safe, providing a stylish, luxurious design. Breathability Allows mattress to perfectly breathe, preventing molding and for long life span by allowing perspiration and moisture to escape.
Easy Assembly The bed frame is packaged in a compact box. Easy to assemble with all necessary tools included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable price but so sturdy and easy-assemble
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Purchased this bed frame for my new place. This one was definitely super affordable, so it's a no brainer.Assembly:The frame came with assembly instructions and all the tools. The process was very straightforward and effortless, and I set this up by myself in maybe 20 minutes. The instructions were simple and clear.Assembling the frame and the slats, as shown in the video I took, was soooo simple! All i hade to do was slot them in😆😆Quality:I was slightly skeptical at first due to its low price, but then the product arrived, and everything looked great! No scratches, defects, or dents. The frame is also very stable, definitely sturdy and exceeded my expectations for the price point. No wobble or noise whatsoever.Overall, I am pretty satisfied with the purchase, especially the quality for this price and how simple it was to put together!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have always had a wood box traditional type of box spring. This is my first build a box spring, and it works well. Very sturdy, no rattling or shaking while I lay on the entire bed. It also comes with a clearly pictured manual of necessary instructions. Also a packet of the screws, a small tool for installing the screws. And extras just incase...That was kind of the company, extras are always a great addition to a package order. It is very well designed. Has a good weight to it, and the appearance is also really nice and painted with a good coating for protection. It was completely put together in less than 30 minutes. I highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT!!! HURRY & BUY IT!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. COMPLETELY NOISE FREE & PERFECT HEIGHT AS OPPOSED TO A UPHOLSTERED BED FRAME THAT IS $700 BUT ONLY 5 INCHES FROM THE FLOOR. THIS IS SUPER STURDY & A GREAT PRICE. EASY ASSEMBLE BUT TIME CONSUMING & COULD TAKE AN HOUR IF ONLY ONE PERSON IS DOING IT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy Support and Sleek Design – PrimaSleep 9 Inch Metal Bed Frame Review
reviews.reviewText: Title: Sturdy Support and Sleek Design – PrimaSleep 9 Inch Metal Bed Frame ReviewRating: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ (5/5)I recently upgraded to the PrimaSleep 9 Inch Modern Metal Bed Frame, and it has transformed my bedroom experience. This mattress foundation with steel slats combines durability, support, and a contemporary design seamlessly.Assembly was a breeze – clear instructions and well-packaged components made it a quick and hassle-free process. The metal frame feels exceptionally sturdy, providing excellent support for my mattress. The steel slats ensure even weight distribution, eliminating the need for a box spring.The 9-inch height strikes a perfect balance – high enough for ample under-bed storage space yet low enough for a modern, streamlined look. The frame's minimalist design complements various decor styles, adding a touch of sophistication to my bedroom.What sets this bed frame apart is its noise-free performance. The steel slats are tightly secured, preventing any creaking or squeaking noises during movement. This feature ensures a peaceful night's sleep without any disturbances.The PrimaSleep bed frame also impresses with its versatility. It accommodates different mattress types and sizes, making it a flexible choice for those looking to switch or upgrade their mattresses in the future.In terms of durability, this bed frame exceeded my expectations. The materials used seem robust, and the overall construction inspires confidence in its long-term reliability.In conclusion, the PrimaSleep 9 Inch Modern Metal Bed Frame is a fantastic investment for those seeking a sturdy, stylish, and noise-free foundation for their mattress. With easy assembly, sleek design, and excellent support, it's a standout choice in the realm of bed frames. I highly recommend it for anyone in search of a quality sleep solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My children are pretty rowdy but we're going on 4 months of using this bed frame, it's holding up great. It's simple yet modern looking and a great item for the price. Satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This frame is good quality and reasonable price. Easy assembling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy!
reviews.reviewText: If I could rate lower I would. This isn't a rant. This bedframe is just garbage. This bedframe hasn't lasted me 2 weeks. The frame is bent. It pops out of place and the bedframe and mattress is falling through. There's no fixing it. There's no other way to hold it together. It was put together correctly as well. I just got what I paid for. A cheap product that won't last. Please do your back a favor and spend a little more for something that is usable. You'll appreciate it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sturdy and stable!
reviews.reviewText: We have a bed that requires a boxspring. We bought the boxspring. Our mattress is fine on a platform bed. When we put the two together it made the bed so high it was like you needed to take a running start to get on the bed!:). The bed was comfortable but it really looked funny and my bedspread didn’t quite fit and it looked like I needed a bedskirt. Thought well maybe Amazon has something and well it sure did. It arrived very quickly and we put it together and Vilà. We have a normal size bed and it looks great. Easy to assemble. Super sturdy and fits perfectly inside bed frame.
